::Battera::

She saw the base and the battle that raged just a few miles away. She 
swooped down and landed at the entrance to the base. She opened her 
link,"Could you open the door or come out to greet me?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Zardus sighs. "There's a battle nearby. Follow me but stay out of 
the way, 
> and watch."
> 
> He walks out of the Alliance base, recieving Battera's 
transmission. He 
> smiles. A message from Feline was probably good news, its been a 
while since 
> he sent them on the mission.
> 
> "You may land," he replies, "But hurry, there's a battle I must get 
to."
